description: This file appears to be a Python script that demonstrates usage of the 'Agent' and 'Message' classes from the 'agno.agent' module to send a message with text and an image URL, and to print the response.

classes.name: Message
classes.description: A class representing a message with role and content, used to structure the message sent to the agent.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of Agent class to send a message and print the response, with options for streaming and markdown formatting.
